DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate factor ( clinical , care-related genetic ) affect renal outcome patient TSC ( Tuberous sclerosis complex )
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Presentation Renal Outcome Patients With Tuberous Sclerosis Complex and/or Renal Angiomyolipoma Great West Region France
